00045 #include "CellLabel.hpp"

00052 template<unsigned DIM>
00053 class DifferentialAdhesionPottsUpdateRule : public AdhesionPottsUpdateRule<DIM>
00054 {
00055 friend class TestPottsUpdateRules;
00056 
00057 private:
00058 
00064     double mLabelledCellLabelledCellAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00065 
00071     double mLabelledCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00072 
00078     double mLabelledCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00079 
00080     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00088     template<class Archive>
00089     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00090     {
00091         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AdhesionPottsUpdateRule<DIM> >(*this);
00092         archive & mLabelledCellLabelledCellAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00093         archive & mLabelledCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00094         archive & mLabelledCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00095     }
00096 
00097 public:
00098 
00102     DifferentialAdhesionPottsUpdateRule();
00103 
00107     virtual ~DifferentialAdhesionPottsUpdateRule();
00108 
00117     virtual double GetCellCellAdhesionEnergy(CellPtr pCellA, CellPtr pCellB);
00118 
00126     virtual double GetCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergy(CellPtr pCell);
00127 
00131     double GetLabelledCellLabelledCellAdhesionEnergyParameter();
00132 
00136     double GetLabelledCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter();
00137 
00141     double GetLabelledCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter();
00142 
00148     void SetLabelledCellLabelledCellAdhesionEnergyParameter(double labelledCellLabelledCellAdhesionEnergyParameter);
00149 
00155     void SetLabelledCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter(double labelledCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter);
00156 
00162     void SetLabelledCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter(double labelledCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter);
00163 
00169     void OutputUpdateRuleParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00170 };
